General.Name: Xiamen Guang Pu Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Guang Pu Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of LED packaging and application products, and flexible electronics in China. It offers LED lighting products, such as flat panel, ceiling, down, and bracket lamps; smart home products; flexible circuit boards; and photoelectric display products. The company also sells medical cosmetic, plastic surgery, and cosmetic products. Xiamen Guang Pu Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.
General.Address: No. 608, West Lingdou Road, Xiamen, China, 361009
